verbs.description: Ivanka Trump [V: was] pictured very naturally throwing a football during the White House ’s Sports and Fitness Day .
[ARG1: Ivanka Trump] was [V: pictured] [ARGM-MNR: very naturally] [ARG1: throwing a football during the White House ’s Sports and Fitness Day] .
[ARG0: Ivanka Trump] was pictured very naturally [V: throwing] [ARG1: a football] [ARGM-TMP: during the White House ’s Sports and Fitness Day] .
